headline: Idexx CEO Shift And AI Imaging Launch Shape Growth Expectations
summary: IDEXX Laboratories has named Michael Erickson as its next CEO, with the transition scheduled for May 2026. The company also introduced the ImageVue DR50 Plus, its most advanced AI powered veterinary imaging system. Both announcements highlight changes in leadership and product focus for NasdaqGS:IDXX in the animal health market. For shareholders watching NasdaqGS:IDXX at a current share price of $670.46, these updates follow a 42.9% return over the past year. The combination of a defined...
